name: Mu Shu Pork
ingredients: 1 pound lean pork, cut in thin strips *
2 eggs, beaten with a dash of salt
Oil and cooking spray, as needed
1 can bamboo shoots, drained and julienned
8 ounces fresh bean sprouts or 14 ounce can, drained
4 green onions, cut on the bias
2 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1 teaspoon fresh ginger, grated or 1/8 teaspoon ground ginger

instructions.en: Combine marinade ingredients in a medium bowl. Add pork, mix well, and marinate in refrigerator for 3 hours.
instructions.sk: V strednej miske zmiešajte ingrediencie na marinádu. Pridajte bravčové mäso, dobre premiešajte a marinujte v chladničke 3 hodiny.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのボウルでマリネの材料を混ぜます。豚肉を加えてよく混ぜ、冷蔵庫で3時間マリネします。

instructions.en: Cook beaten eggs in a sprayed skillet to form a thin 'pancake'. Cool, roll, and slice into ribbons.
instructions.sk: V nastriekanej panvici uvarte rozšľahané vajcia tak, aby vytvorili tenkú 'palacinku'. Ochlaďte, zrolujte a nakrájajte na pásiky.
instructions.ja: スプレーをかけたフライパンで溶き卵を薄い「パンケーキ」状に焼きます。冷まして巻き、細く切ります。

instructions.en: Heat oil in wok. Cook marinated pork, then add vegetables and cook until crisp-tender. Add egg ribbons and heat through. Optionally thicken with xanthan gum and adjust salt.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej vo woku. Uvarte marinované bravčové mäso, potom pridajte zeleninu a varte, kým nie je chrumkavá. Pridajte vaječné pásiky a prehrejte. Voliteľne zahustite xantánovou gumou a upravte soľ.
instructions.ja: 中華鍋で油を熱し、マリネした豚肉を炒めます。野菜を加えてシャキッとするまで炒めます。卵の細切りを加えて温めます。必要に応じてキサンタンガムで濃度を調整し、塩加減を整えます。

instructions.en: Sprinkle with green onions just before serving.
instructions.sk: Tesne pred podávaním posypte jarnou cibuľkou.
instructions.ja: 提供直前にネギを振りかけます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Freezing not recommended. *I used part of a boneless pork loin roast.
